scene.question: It’s a normal day at the Zoo… that is, until closing time. Head Zoo-Keeper William Montague forgets to lock your cage for the night! With mixed feelings, you’re faced with a tough decision: live a meaningless existence in the zoo, or risk it all and escape?
scene.answerTrue: You kick open your cage with enthusiasm and gallop past all the other animals. As the breeze hits you in the face, you get your first taste of freedom!
scene.answerFalse: You decide to stay loyal to Zoo-Keeper William Montague. As the zookeeper makes his morning rounds, he realizes your cage is open. You receive a grateful head scratch and extra breakfast. The first zoo-guest you see is a child with a Giraffe T-Shirt on. He tosses you an extra large wad of bubblegum which you catch in your mouth and happily chew. As the minty flavor explodes on your taste buds, time slows down and you realize you're choking. In your last moments of consciousness, all you remember is that damn kid and the minty flavors of death. You finally die and later become the trending meme on reddit.

scene.question: You’ve made it out! Feeling exhilarated, you decide to get as far away from the zoo as possible. You notice a sign for the Subway. You’ve heard tales of taking the subway to a place called “Mexico” where the beaches are warm, animals roam free and the margaritas flow like wine. Before you reach the subway, you notice a forest beyond the city. Do you go to Viva Mexico or run to the nearby forest to continue your new freedom?
scene.answerTrue: As great as a margarita sounds, you’re a Giraffe and you can’t hold your liquor. You quickly gallop to the nearby forest. As you enter, you smell the sweet lush leaves by the billions. YAY FREEDOM!
scene.answerFalse: You gallop towards the subway. Strangely, there is no one in sight! The train pulls up like clockwork. You have a hard time boarding thanks to your massive Giraffe body. You manage to enter, but before you pull your head inside, the doors shut and lock your 8ft neck and head outside! A chime plays and the train rapidly starts to move. Without another moment’s memory, your head smashes into the confined tunnel. Your become rubber-necked and your head separates from your body, releasing exuberant amounts of ‘glitter’ all over and your body drops lifelessly to the ground. You’re dead!

scene.question: You're in the forest! With a tear of happiness in your eye, visions of eating antidepressant-infused hay flood your memory. You fantasize about finding another Giraffe who has spots-in-all-the-right-places, and dream of making a wobbly-legged baby Giraffe and living happily ever after together... until you approach a split in the road. One path has a cold breeze, grey trees without leaves and the stereotypical hooting owl with beady eyes. The other path continues with lush vegetation and is paved with a yellow brick road… Which path do you take?
scene.answerTrue: You take the road-less-traveled to avoid Zoo-Keeper William Montague. As you tiptoe through the scary forest, you hear what sounds like a forest stream and suddenly feel parched...
scene.answerFalse: You flip off the hooting owl with your hoof and follow the safer path with yellow bricks. Eventually, you clear the forest and see a royal emerald kingdom in the distance. You stop dead in your tracks, realizing someone might report a 20ft Giraffe to the zoo. You try to turn around but you are blocked by a gaggle of Munchkins. They resemble a certain political figure, with orange-faces and disproportionate bodies… you try to run but they pull out a knife and sing, in unison “The Wizard will love a coat made of your beautiful spotted fur!” They stab you repeatedly until Giraffe-glitter covers the yellow bricks. You die and become a wardrobe piece.

scene.question: As you walk you become more and more thirsty. You finally come upon a river stream... but what's that? It's a bear in trap...  You’re faced with the decision to either quench your thirst or help the bear get free, what do you do?
scene.answerTrue: As thirsty as you are, you cannot even think about drinking water. You approach the bear and kick down on the trap. The bear tumbles to the ground in relief. He stands up and hugs you for your bravery and help. Suddenly, his claws accidentally scrape you and a few drops of Giraffe-glitter trickle down your neck. Bear’s eyes pop open with the sweet smell of glitter and he cannot contain his instincts to eat. He attacks and eats you with a tear in his eye. Giraffe is dead. BEAR IS NOW UNLOCKED TO PLAY!
scene.answerFalse: Upon sipping water from the forest stream, you feel a slight tingle upon your bum. You turn and see a red-feathered blow dart hanging from your rear end. You look around in confusion and catch a glimpse of Zoo-Keeper William Montague in the distance. Your vision begins to blur and you awake the next morning to the sound of children outside of your old cage at the zoo. It was quite an adventure but it looks like you are here to stay… for now…

scene.question: After a crazy night out chugging honey with your bear buds, you wake up hungover in a trap. Not again! Suddenly, you see a weird, long-necked horse-thing walking towards you. He takes one look at you and kicks the trap open! With a tear of joy in your eye, you hug him… but you accidentally scratch him. Then you smell it… sweet, sweet animal glitter. You can’t help yourself, you maul the long-neck-horse-thing. You feel remorse… but your hangover is gone and you’re free! As you walk through the woods, you hear voices in the distance. You come upon two humans with hunting rifles, wearing shirts that say “Zoo.” Two thoughts come to mind: Do you sneak up on the Zoo-Keepers and turn them into lunch, or do you try to outrun them? Click to make decisions, right/up arrow to explore!
scene.answerTrue: Since you just ate that horse-thing, you decide to split. You divert the Zoo-Humans by throwing a leftover horse-thing hoof in the opposite direction. They run towards the noise as you sneak by... watch out for the poisonous forest spiders!
scene.answerFalse: It’s time to take a stand… and get some meat in your belly. You begin to creep up on the Zoo-humans, but just as you initiate a fatal flying ninja kick, you get stuck in yet another bear trap! Seriously... Why are there so many bear traps out here?! The Zoo-humans tranquilize you. Hours later you wake up, still stuck in a cage, surrounded by humans… You have been trapped, you’ll probably die in here.

scene.question: Far away from the Zoo-Humans, you start to feel hungry again because #HibernationLife. You doubt that you’ll find another massive animal to devour. You look around and spot a small, lonesome cabin with a smoking chimney. You peek inside and see three unattended bowls of porridge on the table, only one bowl is empty. You hear snoring coming from the open window… a small, blonde human is sleeping in one of the beds… this could be one of these perfect scenarios of eating porridge with a side of human! Do you go inside and feast, or find some berries and honey instead?
scene.answerTrue: You already had two close calls, better play it safe. You walk towards the mountains in search of wildflower honey. Just as you start to reconsider your decision, you see three bears barge into the cabin. You hear the girl scream until the sounds of feasting bears radiates through the forest. Good thing you didn’t go in there…
scene.answerFalse: Winter is coming and you need to prepare for hibernation. You go inside and devour the little human before she knows what hit her. Now time for dessert! You grab the small bowl of porridge, but it is way too cold. You reach for the biggest bowl, but it is way too hot. You realize why the human ate the other bowl, it must have been just right. Suddenly, the door swings open and three angry bears storm in. Momma Bear screams in horror as she sees her new egyptian cotton sheets stained with glitter… They roar in rage and attack you ruthlessly. Your glitter is everywhere. You’re SUPER dead... GAME OVER!

scene.question: You’re one lucky sonuvabear! The smell of flowers wafts past your nose and as all bears know - where there are flowers, there are bees, and where there are bees, there is honey. You drool over the thought of it all. Finally, you hear buzzing and track down a hive… but it looks different from those you’ve seen before… it is much darker in color, as are the bees, which are also bigger and not as fluffy or nice looking as regular bees. With an uneasy feeling in your gut you contemplate: Should I eat this new honey or look for a more familiar beehive?
scene.answerTrue: It is time to reward yourself with some delicious honey. You karate chop the hive off the tree, breaking it in half and releasing all the bees. To your horror, you see there is no honey… and the bees are pissed. These are not honey bees, these are hornets! Your honey-goggles steered you wrong! The Hornets start a barrage of stinging as you run away. You run towards the snowy mountains and finally the hornets give up on their attack.
scene.answerFalse: There’s something off about this hive, so you decide to keep trekking. You see a cozy cave and decide to lay down and rest. As you sleep, a storm blows in. You awake to discover that a massive avalanche has sealed you in the cave. You feel weak with very little oxygen left in the small cave. You try to dig your way out and accidentally knock loose a support rock that is keeping the cave from collapsing. Just like that, a frozen boulder comes crashing down over your head and the snow is painted with your bear-glitter as everything goes black. THE END… YOU’RE SUPER DEAD.

scene.question: As you walk through the frozen forest, you start to swell from the stings. You are about to pass out from the pain, but then you see steam rising up from a nearby pond. Eureka! A hot spring! You run over and prepare to cannonball into the bubbling pool, but as you get closer you see that it’s full of snow monkeys! You have two options: do you let out a powerful roar to scare them away or see if they’ll let you join them?
scene.answerTrue: You whimper and show submission, and to your delight the monkeys nod their approval. You slide into the hot tub feeling extremely grateful. You are so comfortable that you drift off to sleep… and you sadly drown. GAME OVER, YOU HAVE UNLOCKED SNOW MONKEY!
scene.answerFalse: You let out the loudest roar ever… but the monkeys aren’t going anywhere. The Alpha Monkey looks you in the eyes and makes a gesture with his thumb across his throat. The other monkeys grab sharpened sticks, but they don’t seem to want leave the hot tub so you are able to limp away. You pass out in the snow, saying your last goodbyes to this cruel world… but to your horror you wake up in the Zoo! At least you’ll get some tasty snacks!
